item.description:
Please join us on Sunday, June 3rd for a puggie meetup. We have a huge fenced in yard so we don't have to worry about letting our puggies off leash. Hopefully this time we will get nicer weather. We hope you all can make it. All group members are welcome!!

Feel free to contact me with any questions at all.

Alissa & Buster

group.name: The Northshore MA Pug Meetup Group

item.name: Buster's Raindate Meetup
